remarks: The set of neighbors of an element of the first component of an ordered pair, especially of a vertex in a graph.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Oct-2017.)
statement:
nbgraop $p |- ( ( ( V e. Y /\ E e. Z ) /\ N e. V ) -> ( <. V , E >. Neighbors N ) = { n e. V | { N , n } e. ran E } ) $.
$d E n $.
$d N n $.
$d V n $.
$d Y n $.
$d Z n $.
